title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Mathematical Analysis Skill Development for Pre-Service Elementary Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Solve proportional and logarithmic problems using various methods and analyze the applied mathematical knowledge with over 80% accuracy.
Creatively generate at least three variations of a given mathematical problem and explain educational utilization strategies.
Institutionalize mathematical analysis processes through team collaboration and achieve over 70% of individual learning outcomes based on evaluation criteria.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
